answers.answer: You need to go and be seen by Doctor darkening of the skin around the neck and other areas that folds is a sign of potential diabetes I don't want to frighten you but it is definitely something you should get addressed. It could be nothing but on the other hand it could be something to catch it now
I had that problem. I know it's not gestational diabetes.  My doctor says it's normal. For certain parts of your body to darken because of the increase of blood flow.
I also had a dark spot on my neck. Doctor looked at it and said it was completely normal. Also that it should go away after I deliver.
Parts of my body has hot darker since I got pregnant & I don't have diabetes. It's just body hormones.
Lol yes, mines and my sister's did with our first pregnancy
I got darker in a lot of areas. Lol. My complexion is all off. Lol
Yes I'd say your fine. For me it was my arm pits. It looked disgusting. Luckily for me though it's winter so I can wear long sleeves to cover it up and not summer
Lol thank u mommies....I guess we should enjoy this beautiful symptom of pregnancy  :-)

question: It's just a silly question lol did anyone's neck got really dark during pregnancy?
title: silly question
